value:
$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Rise, Líf.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|As the new ruler of the realm
of the dead, I have granted you
new power.$k$pYou already know what you must
do with it.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|You want me to kill Eir, who was
once princess of what is now your
realm... Am I correct?$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|It is. I thought I had finished her
myself, but it seems she was able
to use some power unknown to me...$k$pIt must be some power granted
to her by dint of her place of birth,
as she used it to revive herself.$k$pI would finish the job myself, but
the responsibility of ruling the realm
demands my attention.$k$pAs ruler, I should not need to deal
with such petty matters with my
own hands.$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...It is beneath you. But I will carry
out the task.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Yes, in Lady Hel's name...$k$pAs you are a warrior sworn to serve
the realm of the dead, I will allow
you to move freely.$k$pI trust your abilities. In order to keep
this realm running smoothly, I hope
to make good use of them.$k$pBut know that as ruler I now hold
power over the armies of the dead.$k$pShould you think to betray me...
remember I can use that power as
I please, but I have chosen not to.$k$pYou, too, can be made to serve.
Though I prefer this arrangement...$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p

$bEvBg_Chapter3_Hell|$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Ah, there they are... These wavering
shadows are the souls of the realm
of life.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Come to us, souls of the realm...
Everything will be all right.$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|These souls will now rest within
you, Eir. It may be overwhelming
at first... Do you feel well?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|There are so many... How many
are left?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Only a few more now... One seems
to be lingering behind—$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Lingering? Is it different somehow?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Look out, Eir!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You! ...Líf?!$k$p$WmMEID_リーヴ2,ch00_17_Lif_M_Weapon01,Face|Hello, Princess Eir. My apologies,
but I have come to kill you. You
die here and now.$k$p

$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Is Mordecai so scary? Others only
run away. No one will spar...$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|What are you doing out here all
alone, Mordecai? Everyone is back
at the festival, having fun.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|That is the problem. No one
will try to fight Mordecai...$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Ah. I see... Well, facing you in
hand-to-hand combat could be
quite an intimidating proposition.$k$pBut there must be someone who
will be willing to spar with you!$k$pI have nothing pressing to attend
to... May I help track down some
opponents for you?$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|That would make Mordecai very
happy! Thank you.$k$p

$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Sorry for making you wait, Mordecai!
I brought some festival sparring
partners for you.$k$pWhat do you think? They should
be strong enough that you won't
have to hold back, right?$k$p$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|Will this take long? The birds are
starting to get hungry...$k$p$WmMPID_ゴンザレス,ch02_38_Gonzales_M_Normal,Face|Ah! Mine hungry too!$k$p$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|Oh? In that case, here. Take some
spare seed.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Such cute birds! Every one...
Your friends?$k$p$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|They are. This face intimidates
most people, but the birds don't
seem to mind it.$k$p$WmMPID_ゴンザレス,ch02_38_Gonzales_M_Normal,Face|Same with me. Birds not afraid.
Birds come and say hello.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Mordecai understands. We three
think the same.$k$pWe will get along well...$k$pOh! Wait here! Mordecai will call
more birds to share.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Hey! Wait a minute! What happened
to sparring, and the festival? You said
you wanted opponents!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Right. Thank you for finding new
friends for Mordecai.$k$pBut time with friends not fighting
always better than fighting.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Oh... I suppose I can't argue with you.
Still, this is unexpected.$k$pBut I'm happy I could help find
you friends who share interests
beyond festival sparring!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Hah! We make our own festival!$k$p
